title: 259: The Newlywed Game!
itunes:title: 259: The Newlywed Game!
description:
It’s time to play The Newlywed Game with The Broads and The Bros hosted by Malik B! Bekah and Grayston compete against Evan and Jess to find out which couple knows more about each other! It gets wild, it gets hectic, it gets competitive, and they laugh until they cry! This may be one you want to watch so make sure to check out Chatty Broads Youtube Channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

 

THANKS TO OUR HOST - MALIK B:

Follow him at: @malikbazille

Check out his website: www.malikdrip.com

 

***ETTITUDE: Get 20% off your order, plus free shipping at ETTITUDE.COM/CHATTYBROADS and enter promo code CHATTYBROADS

***STAMPS.COM: Use promo code, CHATTY at stamps.com to get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale!

***UPSTART: Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to UPSTART.COM/CHATTY

***JUNESHINE: Get 20% off PLUS  free shipping SITE WIDE at JUNESHINE.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY at checkout!

***HELIX: Go to HELIXSLEEP.COM/CHATTY for up to $200 off and two free pillows!

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS:

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/
